about_the_game: This DLC adds the original Japanese subtitles to the title.  It also adds Japanese to the game's user interface.  This is the first title that Cherry Kiss Games has the rights to provide Japanese subtitles and we're excited to be able to offer to our fans.  Enjoy the authentic adult Japanese visual novel experience in the original Japanese too!

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
-  Contains blackmail/coercion.

detailed_description: This DLC adds the original Japanese subtitles to the title.  It also adds Japanese to the game's user interface.  This is the first title that Cherry Kiss Games has the rights to provide Japanese subtitles and we're excited to be able to offer to our fans.  Enjoy the authentic adult Japanese visual novel experience in the original Japanese too!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Angel Sex Pet - Japanese version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
